column3: This field is used to record the type of measurement that the dimension of the documented archival unit represents.
column5: This field is used to record the type of measurement that the dimension of the documented object represents.

column3: This field is used to record the value of the measured dimension of the documented archival unit.
column5: This field is used to record the value of the measured dimension of the documented object.

column3: This field is used to record the unit of the measured dimension of the documented archival unit.
column5: This field is used to record the unit of the measured dimension of the documented object.

column3: This field is used to record the actor who undertook the measurement producing the dimension of the documented archival unit.
column5: This field is used to record the actor who undertook the measurement producing the dimension of the documented object.
